Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about my services and the collaboration process.

Reels Packages

How long does filming take?

A single filming day takes about 6 hours. During that time, we capture material for 3-8 Reels videos.

Do I need to have scripts ready?

No! In the Growth and Dominance packages, script creation is included. Together we'll brainstorm topics that will engage your audience.

How quickly will I receive the finished videos?

Initial previews are usually within 3-5 days. Final version after your feedback.

Can I use the videos on other networks?

Yes! Vertical videos (9:16) work great on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and LinkedIn.

Creative Production

How much does a commercial spot cost?

It depends on the scope of the project. Basic spot from ¬£950, complex production with actors and locations from ¬£1,800. I'll always give you the price upfront.

How long does production take?

From the first call to the final video usually 2-4 weeks. It depends on the complexity of the project.

Do you provide actors and locations?

Yes, I can provide complete production including casting, locations, and equipment.

Can you film a TV commercial?

Yes, for large projects I collaborate with SocialVids, who have experience with TV commercials.

UGC & Acting

How much does one UGC video cost?

The price depends on the length, number of videos (packages are more cost-effective), and production requirements. Contact me for a price list.

Do I need to send the product?

Yes, for an authentic video, I need to have the product physically with me. I can send it back after filming.

How soon will the video be ready?

I typically deliver the first preview within 3-5 business days after receiving the product.

Does the price include advertising rights?

Yes, the price usually includes rights for use in ads (Usage Rights) for 12 months.

Event Video

Do you film outside of London?

Yes, I film across the UK and internationally (primarily Prague).

How quickly will I receive the event video?

I offer express delivery - short clips for social media the same evening, complete aftermovie within 5-7 days.

Do I need more videographers?

For smaller events, I am enough. For large events, I can provide a full team.

Does the price include drone footage?

Drone footage is for an extra fee. We'll discuss this during the consultation.

Live Streaming

What connection do we need?

Ideally a stable internet connection with at least 10 Mbps upload. I can also provide a backup 4G/5G connection.

Where can we broadcast?

YouTube, Facebook, LinkedIn, Zoom, or your own platform. We can broadcast to multiple platforms simultaneously.

What if the internet fails?

I always have a backup connection and local recording. Even if the stream drops, the video is not lost.

How many cameras do you use?

It depends on the project. Basic setup = 2 cameras, for large conferences up to 4-5 cameras + vision mixer.

Editing & Post-production

Can you edit my own footage?

Yes! Send me your material and I'll turn it into a professional video.

How long does editing take?

It depends on the length and complexity. A short Reels video (60s) = 1-2 days. A longer video (5-10 min) = 3-5 days.

Does the price include music?

Yes, I use licensed music from libraries I subscribe to. If you want a specific song, we can purchase it.

How many revisions do I get?

Usually 2 rounds of revisions. If you need more, we can agree on it.

Voiceover

How quickly will I receive the recording?

I deliver most orders within 24 hours. If it's urgent, I can even do it within a few hours.

Can I hear samples?

Yes! On this page you will find audio samples from my projects (Prazdroj, ƒåSOB, Oreo).

What formats do you deliver?

MP3, WAV, or any format you need. Always in high quality.

Can you do dubbing too?

Yes, I also do dubbing for videos, e-learning courses, or animations.

I create videos. Reels, TikTok & Full Production. Partner SocialVids.
